1 About This report uses cholera outbreak data from the Division of Disease Surveillance and Response, with the first case reported on 9th October 2022. We start with a national scenario where we showcase: - Cases over time - Distribution by sex - Spatial visualization (you may hover over the map to get the number of cases) This is also done for the counties with reported cases. There is a menu on the left which enables you to navigate from one county to the other. The analytics and visualizations are created by the Center for Epidemiological Modelling and Analysis (CEMA) at the University of Nairobi, Kenya.
2 National 2.1 Cases over time 2.2 Demographic distribution 2.3 Spatial distribution
